summary.text:
**Exploring directory commands**

1) cd .. (ran in /Users/leemoore/code/codex-port-02/cody-fastify) — succeeded
2) pwd (ran in /Users/leemoore/code/codex-port-02/cody-fastify) — output: /Users/leemoore/code/codex-port-02/cody-fastify
3) ls -la (ran in /Users/leemoore/code/codex-port-02) — printed the directory listing (included above)

Note: tool calls run in isolated shell invocations by default, so a cd in one call doesn't change the working directory for subsequent exec calls unless you pass the cwd parameter. I passed explicit cwd values where needed to produce the ls output from /Users/leemoore/code/codex-port-02. If you want persistent directory changes across calls, tell me which directory to use as cwd for future commands.
